languages.text: "Думаю, это сторожа. Корабли поднялись с поверхности планетоида, как только мы облучили его оком авгуров. Не то чтобы я разбирался в ксенопсихологии, зато неплохо разбираюсь в маневрах флота, и вот что я скажу: эти ребята очень злы и идут на нас самой прямой и агрессивной траекторией".

"I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, это сторожа. Корабли поднялись с поверхности планетоида, как только мы облучили его оком авгуров. Не то чтобы я разбирался в ксенопсихологии, зато неплохо разбираюсь в маневрах флота, и вот что я скажу: эти ребята очень злы и идут на нас самой прямой и агрессивной траекторией".

traits.locale_text: "I think they are guards. Ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we irradiated it with the eye of augurs. I am not a big expert in xenopsychology, but as a master of fleet manoeuvres I will tell for sure: these guys are really angry and they are approaching us in a straight and aggressive trajectory."

"I think they are guards. Ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we irradiated it with the eye of augurs. I am not a big expert in xenopsychology, but as a master of fleet manoeuvres I will tell for sure: these guys are really angry and they are approaching us in a straight and aggressive trajectory."

"I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we irradiated it with the eye of augurs. I am not a big expert in xenopsychology, but as a master of fleet manoeuvre I can assure you that these guys are really angry and they are approaching us on a direct and aggressive trajectory."

"I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we irradiated it with the eye of augurs. I am not a big expert in xenopsychology, but as a master of fleet manoeuvre I can assure you that these guys are really angry and they are approaching us on a direct and aggressive trajectory."

"I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

languages.text: “我认为他们应该是守卫。我们才刚刚用俄歇矩阵扫描那颗行星，他们的飞船就冲了过来。虽然我不擅长揣摩异形的心理，但身为虚空舰专家，我可以保证：那些家伙真的是要气疯了，他们正以最直接、最激进的航线，毫不掩饰地朝我们冲过来。”
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

traits.locale_text: “我认为他们应该是守卫。我们才刚刚用俄歇矩阵扫描那颗行星，他们的飞船就冲了过来。虽然我不擅长揣摩异形的心理，但身为虚空舰专家，我可以保证：那些家伙真的是要气疯了，他们正以最直接、最激进的航线，毫不掩饰地朝我们冲过来。”

languages.text: « Je pense qu'ils montent la garde. Les vaisseaux ont décollé de la surface du planétoïde à l'instant où nous l'avons illuminé avec l'œil des augures. Je ne m'y connais pas vraiment en psychologie xénos, mais ma parfaite connaissance des manœuvres de combat peut vous assurer que ces types sont vraiment remontés et qu'ils s'approchent de nous sur une trajectoire agressive. »
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense qu'ils montent la garde. Les vaisseaux ont décollé de la surface du planétoïde à l'instant où nous l'avons illuminé avec l'œil des augures. Je ne m'y connais pas vraiment en psychologie xénos, mais ma parfaite connaissance des manœuvres de combat peut vous assurer que ces types sont vraiment remontés et qu'ils s'approchent de nous sur une trajectoire agressive. »

languages.text: "Ich glaube, sie sind Wachen. Die Schiffe sind von der Oberfläche des Planetoiden gestartet, als das Auge unserer Auguren darauf richteten. Ich bin kein Xenos-Experte, aber ich kenne meine Leerenmanöver und sage Euch eines: Sie sind wütend und näher sich uns auf einer direkten und unmissverständlich aggressiven Flugbahn."
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, sie sind Wachen. Die Schiffe sind von der Oberfläche des Planetoiden gestartet, als das Auge unserer Auguren darauf richteten. Ich bin kein Xenos-Experte, aber ich kenne meine Leerenmanöver und sage Euch eines: Sie sind wütend und näher sich uns auf einer direkten und unmissverständlich aggressiven Flugbahn."

"Ich glaube, es handelt sich um Wachen. Die Schiffe starteten von der Oberfläche des Planetoiden, als wir ihn mit dem Auge der Auguren bestrahlten. Ich bin kein großer Xenopsychologe, aber als Meister der Flottenmanöver versichere ich Euch, dass diese Typen ganz schön wütend sind und sich uns auf direktem Weg aggressiv nähern."

languages.text: «Creo que son guardias. Las naves despegaron del planetoide en cuanto lo bañó la luz de nuestros augures. No soy ninguna autoridad sobre la mente de los xenos, pero sí entiendo de maniobras en el vacío y puedo decirle esto: están enfadados y se acercan en una trayectoria de ataque que no deja lugar a ambigüedades».
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que son guardias. Las naves despegaron del planetoide en cuanto lo bañó la luz de nuestros augures. No soy ninguna autoridad sobre la mente de los xenos, pero sí entiendo de maniobras en el vacío y puedo decirle esto: están enfadados y se acercan en una trayectoria de ataque que no deja lugar a ambigüedades».

languages.text: 「彼らは衛兵だと思う。スキャナーたちの眼を浴びるとすぐに、船は小惑星の表面から飛び立った。私は異種族の心について専門家とは言えないが、虚空での作戦については知っているつもりだ。そして、これだけは確かだ。彼らは怒っていて、直接的で明確な攻撃的軌道で近づいてきている」
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは衛兵だと思う。スキャナーたちの眼を浴びるとすぐに、船は小惑星の表面から飛び立った。私は異種族の心について専門家とは言えないが、虚空での作戦については知っているつもりだ。そして、これだけは確かだ。彼らは怒っていて、直接的で明確な攻撃的軌道で近づいてきている」

languages.text: "Galiba muhafız bunlar. Gemiler, alametlerimizin gözüne çarpar çarpmaz cüce gezegenden kalkış yaptı. Zeno aklı uzmanlık alanım değildir ama uçsuz manevralarını iyi bilirim. Öfkeliler, doğrudan ve açıkça saldırgan bir güzergâhta ilerliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I think they are guards. The ships took off from the surface of the planetoid as soon as we bathed it with the eye of our augurs. I'm not an expert on xenos minds, but I know my void manoeuvres, and I can tell you this: they are angry, and they are approaching on a direct and unambiguously aggressive trajectory."
